headline: Progressive: Premium Valuation At Peak Profitability
summary: Progressive stock shows solid financial performance with robust premium growth. Learn why PGR shares aren't quite a buy and what investors should look for.

headline: Is Progressive's Profitability Anchored by Combined Ratio?
summary: PGR's profitability hinges on disciplined underwriting and a strong combined ratio, even as inflation and loss costs pressure margins.

headline: What Makes The Progressive Corporation (PGR) a Good Investment?
summary: Baron Funds, an investment management company, released its “Baron FinTech Fund” second quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the second quarter, the fund returned 9.26% (Institutional Shares) compared to a 13.82% return for the FactSet Global FinTech Index (Benchmark). Since its inception, the fund has appreciated at […]
